snippet: Thai military courts sentenced two people to long prison terms on charges of insulting the monarchy, lawyers and a legal monitoring group said.
abstract: Thai military courts sentence two people to decades-long prison terms for insulting the monarchy in Facebook postings.
lead_paragraph: Thai military courts sentenced two people to long prison terms on charges of insulting the monarchy, lawyers and a legal monitoring group said.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Thailand: 2 Punished for Insulting King
